attributes.action: Prevent the spread of Microsoft Vista Operating System
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hardware compatibility forces new users to purchase new hardware.
Software compatibility forces users to spend out on additional computer repairs.
This is a slower, less efficient operating system which doesn't meet the requirement of the average user.
Please prevent the spread of Vista and Please help us to assist Microsoft in  keeping its XP line of products available until 2010 (at minimum).

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
